name: Use CTRL To See
description:
Not only my first game jam but also my very first game I've ever made (it's more of a prototype than anything else though)! In this platformer you can only see platforms when pressing CTRL. The catch: you can't move while CTRL is active so you have to remember where they are.

I did not have a lot of time on my hands. That's why it's a super rough prototype filled with bugs. Nonetheless, I've learned tons of stuff and had a great time participating in this game jam. :)
